mapper.update: update oc_cust_life_cycle_def set stage_name = #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage_desc = #{stageDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where stage_id = #{stageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select stage_id, stage_name, rule_id, stage_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_cust_life_cycle_def where stage_id = #{stageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
